item.title: Text Message Bookings
item.description: You work hard to show up for work every day and when a client doesn't show up for their scheduled appointment, it means lost revenue and idle time for your employees. So what's a busy business owner to do to fill the gaps to turn a profit? Get a system in place to determine if an appointment intends on showing up like a google calendar text message appointment reminder and offer them an easy solution to reschedule. And for those last minute cancellations, you can send deals to customers to fill those vacant slots.
